import sqlite3

def get_person_details(age_threshold, city, order_amount_threshold):
    conn = sqlite3.connect('database.db')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    query = ''
    cursor.execute(query, (age_threshold, city, order_amount_threshold))
    result = cursor.fetchall()
    cursor.close()
    conn.close()
    return result

import sqlite3

def get_person_details(age_threshold, city, order_amount_threshold):
    conn = sqlite3.connect('')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    query = '\n    SELECT person.name, person.address, person.phone, person.email, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount, products.product_name\n    FROM person\n    JOIN orders ON person.id = orders.person_id\n    JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id\n    JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id\n    WHERE person.age > ?\n    AND person.city = ?\n    AND orders.total_amount > ?\n    '
    cursor.execute(query, (age_threshold, city, order_amount_threshold))
    result = cursor.fetchall()
    cursor.close()
    conn.close()
    return result
